story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_0300_:
The reason I find it beautiful is because of how it
chooses to exist.
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_0400_:
Volcanion possesses massive power, but instead of
brandishing it, it chooses to hide itself within
the steam...
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_0500_:
I do not plan to monopolize Volcanion’s power for
my own ideals.
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_0600_:
But if any foolish human appears and tries to
pollute this world with filth...
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_0700_:
Volcanion and I shall come out of the steam and
pass judgment.
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_0900_:
In Kalos, you thought that without the power of
Pokémon, you weren’t able to use the
ultimate weapon...
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_1000_: And even now, you need Volcanion’s help, right?
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_1100_:
If you think you need help from others in order
to pursue your motives...
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_1200_:
then instead of trying to destroy the world, why
don’t you find a way to protect it, with help from
everyone else?
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_1300_:
Th-that’s right! We should all be allowed to decide
the future of our world together!
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_1400_:
There are many people who are trying to make
the world a better place, too.
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_1500_:
It would be nice if everyone in this world could be
as purehearted as you are.
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_1600_: Then I could cast aside my doubts.
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_1700_:
My heart hurts thinking that I need to eliminate
such a beautiful place like Pasio.
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_1800_: W-we won’t let you do that!
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_2000_: We’ll make a new promise with you, Lysandre!
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_2200_:
I see you are blessed with beautiful friends. I shall
keep my hopes high.
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_2300_:
Oh, and by the way, I will deal with the
troublemakers from Team Flare...
story_teamflare_02_09000/2401_1001_2400_: I am the leader of my organization, after all.
